title.rendered: Imagined myself playing for India so many times: Yashasvi on debut

content.rendered:
Yashasvi Jaiswal, a 21-year-old opener for India, claimed that he had always fantasized about representing his country and that his international debut against the West Indies will always “be very memorable” to him.

Read More: What’s the difference between me and another person if I also sulk: Ashwin on WTC final

Yashasvi continued, “Making my debut was the most crucial thing, but winning Player of the Match is incredible.” In the first Test, Yashasvi received a score of 171 (387).
